message: I'm excited to offer you this product! It's a great deal at $100, and I'm confident you'll love it. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased this product, and I'm sure you will too.
I'll take it!

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This one is also a great deal at $100, and I think you'll really appreciate the value. It's a unique opportunity to get a product like this at this price, and I'm sure you won't find it anywhere else.
I'm not sure if this one is as good as the last one. I'll pass for now.

I completely understand your hesitation! But I can assure you that this product is just as good as the last one. In fact, it's even more popular among our customers. I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this one - it's still only $100, and I'm throwing in a free bonus item that's worth $20. What do you say?
I'm not convinced that this product is worth the price, even with the bonus item. I'll pass for now.

I think I can change your mind! This product is one of our top-sellers, and for good reason. It's a game-changer in its industry, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm offering it to you for the same price as the previous products, $100, but I'm willing to give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. What do you say?
I'll take a chance, but only because of the money-back guarantee. If it's low-quality, I can return it and get my $100 back.

I'm glad you're willing to give it a try! This product is indeed one of our top-performers, and I think you'll be thrilled with its performance. As a valued customer, I'd like to offer you an exclusive deal - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a second one of equal or lesser value absolutely free. That's right, you'll get two products for the price of one! What do you say?
I'll take the deal, but only because I'm hoping the second product will be high-quality too. I'm not sure if I want to take on two low-quality products.

I completely understand your concerns! But I want to assure you that this product is a one-time mistake. I've been in the business for a long time, and I've never had a problem with quality control before. I'm willing to make it right, though. If you buy this product and it doesn't meet your expectations, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. Plus, I'll throw in a $20 gift card to use on your next purchase. That way, you can try something new and risk-free. What do you say?
I'm not convinced that this product is worth the risk, even with the refund and gift card. I'll pass for now.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to make a special offer just for you. I've got a limited quantity of this product left, and I'm willing to give you an exclusive deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount, making it just $90. That's the lowest price I've ever offered on this product. Plus, I'll throw in a free shipping upgrade, so you'll get it delivered to your doorstep in no time. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the discount or free shipping. I'm not convinced that this product is worth the $90.

I understand that you're hesitant, but I want to share something with you. I've had a few customers who were initially skeptical about this product, but they ended up loving it. In fact, one of them even wrote a glowing review saying it's the best thing they've ever bought. I'm willing to send you a copy of that review, so you can see for yourself. Plus, I'll give you an additional 5% off the price, making it $85. That's the lowest price I've ever offered on this product. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the review, and the discount isn't enough to change my mind. I'll pass for now.

I understand that you're still hesitant, and I respect that. However, I want to offer you a unique opportunity to make a statement. This product is a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to a select few. If you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized thank-you note from the manufacturer, signed by the CEO. It's a one-of-a-kind item that will make you stand out from the crowd. Plus, I'll still give you the 5% discount, making it $85. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the personalized note or the discount. I'm not convinced that this product is worth the $85.

Plus, I'll throw in a premium warranty that covers any defects or issues for the next 2 years. That's a total value of $30 in additional benefits. What do you say?
I'll take the discount and warranty, but I'm hoping this product is actually high-quality this time.
